data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=TXi4YhTIGmMQ7kNvgERlMe7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AkmupKFb1KOAl9DCkIEm8kz&oh=00_AYB_0m6-Ny-eWubVfRi4cpppXTWPO77XdoMBIkC3Bqy-AA&oe=66DC399C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ZhU5yXqp8a0Q7kNvgEqcu7V&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AkmupKFb1KOAl9DCkIEm8kz&oh=00_AYBfluS5OyIc9e-XHhbzae51infzWmBP0v08Z9a9YcYsAA&oe=66DC4324)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=62SvWMNorGMQ7kNvgG02n5o&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AkmupKFb1KOAl9DCkIEm8kz&oh=00_AYBVsCYjmIsPFYHMT5puXOJaxyd5ZVGRKWwxwZ_j9shDjg&oe=66DC2A87)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=b6426L3yzroQ7kNvgG_Qg7S&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AkmupKFb1KOAl9DCkIEm8kz&oh=00_AYAaE90MGBaLtxB2WRNRHSzuDbsG-OAcpO8EhkK--eJ_vQ&oe=66DC1D66)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=cUhJOMfT69kQ7kNvgG0ZYeZ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AkmupKFb1KOAl9DCkIEm8kz&oh=00_AYCdrVxfymUNdFExCv9AhurG5-pdWQNPLEGEWeN2kaHLsA&oe=66DC49D8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Rr2LI7jyomsQ7kNvgE2odiI&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AkmupKFb1KOAl9DCkIEm8kz&oh=00_AYCda_cNn1IC4AYrtw1pptIO48Ls8bH23g-feVEkANtlog&oe=66DC4659)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XGpA2_JifloQ7kNvgGrOp-d&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AkmupKFb1KOAl9DCkIEm8kz&oh=00_AYD7kJi7OWO_XQPLyiQg0JTbepHSU-TqYYxzPVqH2dekgg&oe=66DC2C70)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DbGn_-XdbaQQ7kNvgFytwex&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AkmupKFb1KOAl9DCkIEm8kz&oh=00_AYDSsoSwAtYkp5WmcP1HiPt4xfwnRlFmRXUFfAjxlo2GJQ&oe=66DC16EA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=4fEuzH7cnrAQ7kNvgFhCD6u&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AkmupKFb1KOAl9DCkIEm8kz&oh=00_AYBEXeBx1uH-2egPgi22NpDreRb5LJG0aFC4sFjlHcByRg&oe=66DC2A97)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=g5b25FFtyn8Q7kNvgFkTs3i&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AkmupKFb1KOAl9DCkIEm8kz&oh=00_AYAwyQv9YEOh5IEhkvYN4xLCsBzAn4pHKTQWvifOu4jnKA&oe=66DC460C)
